alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Wayne; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Wayne and Wilson Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fremont, or 10 miles northeast of Goldsboro, moving north at 20 mph. Additional thunderstorms were located 7 miles southeast of Wilson. HAZARD...Heavy rain with up to an inch in 30 minutes. Gusty winds to 30 to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Locally heavy rain may produce ponding on area roadways. Locations impacted include... Goldsboro, Wilson, Fremont, Lucama, Stantonsburg, Black Creek, Pikeville, Macclesfield, Saratoga and Sims. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
